artist: Artist: Carlos Amorales; Printer: Highpoint Editions, Minneapolis; Publisher: Highpoint Editions, Minneapolis

description: One of four maps of the world relief printed from laser-cut Plexiglas mounted on masonite in solid black with the countries dislocated from their normal placements, often overlapping.
